name: workscript
description: A modular workflow orchestration system with plugin architecture
author: Narcis Brindusescu

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ENGINE,API,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,green" "bun run dev:engine" "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: bun run build:engine && bun run build:api && bun run build:frontend
scripts.test: bun run test:engine && bun run test:api
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p packages/engine && tsc --noEmit -p apps/api && tsc --noEmit -p apps/frontend
scripts.dev:legacy: concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "yellow,green" "cd server && bun run dev" "cd client && bun run dev"
